<summary><h1 style="display: inline;">Strings</h1></summary>

## Create String

```javascript
let a = 'Hritik'        // Single/Double both allowed
let b = "Roshan"
let c = `hi ${a} ${b}`  // String Interpolation

let d = new String(c)   // String object wrapper

console.log(typeof a, typeof b, typeof c, typeof d)

/* Output
string string string object
*/
```

## Imp Properties/Methods

```javascript
let a = "hello world"

console.log(a.length)
console.log(a.charAt(2))// l
console.log(a.at(-2))   // Allow -ve index
console.log(a[-2])      // undefined

console.log(a.slice(-5, 9))
console.log(a.substring(2, 5))      // NOT ALlowed -veIndex
console.log(a.includes('ld'))
console.log(a.replace('ld', '-'))

console.log(a.toUpperCase())
console.log(a.trim())
```

**Output**

```
11
l
l
undefined
wor
llo
true
hello wor-
HELLO WORLD
hello world
```

<summary><h1 style="display: inline;">Numbers</h1></summary>

## Number

```javascript
let a = 105.678               // number
let b = new Number(105.678)   // object

console.log(a.toFixed(2))       // return string
console.log(a.toPrecision(2))   // Return String

console.log(Math.round(a, 2))
console.log(Math.ceil(a))
console.log(Math.floor(a))
```

**Output**

```
105.68
1.1e+2
106
106
105
```

</details>

<summary><h1 style="display: inline;">Array</h1></summary>

## Array Create

```javascript
const arr = [1,2,3, true, "hi"]

console.log(arr.length)
console.log(arr[3], arr[-2]) // -ve index not work

x = arr.push(50)
y = arr.pop()
console.log(x,y,arr, "\n")

console.log(arr.includes('hi'))
console.log(arr.indexOf('hi'))
```

**Output**

```
5
true undefined
6 50 [ 1, 2, 3, true, 'hi' ]

true
4
```

## Array More

```javascript
console.log(Array.isArray('Hitesh'))
console.log(Array.from('Hitesh'))   // Create Array from String
console.log(Array.from({name: 'hites'}))   // what will happen?

console.log()

console.log(Array.of(100, 200, 300))

console.log()
const arr = [1,2,3, true, "hi"]
const arr2 = [7,8,9]

console.log([...arr, ...arr2])
```

**Output**

```
false
[ 'H', 'i', 't', 'e', 's', 'h' ]
[]

[ 100, 200, 300 ]

[
  1,    2, 3, true,
  'hi', 7, 8, 9
]
```
